meanings.definition: A unit of area equal to ten ares.
meanings.sent1: My grandparents own a dekare of land where they grow vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's field measured exactly one dekare.
meanings.sent3: The dekare of land was so small, it could fit only a few trees.
meanings.sent4: In the game, each player claimed their dekare of territory to defend.
meanings.sent5: The dekare of flowers in the garden painted a colorful picture.

meanings.definition: A metric unit of area equal to 1000 square meters.
meanings.sent1: The construction site required a dekare of space for the new building.
meanings.sent2: The park was vast, spanning over several dekares of greenery.
meanings.sent3: The dekare of land was marked off for the upcoming festival.
meanings.sent4: The dekare of farmland stretched out as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent5: The dekare of forest was a peaceful retreat for hikers.
